title: Calculate Daily Mark-to-Market P&L
description: A risk analyst calculates the daily profit and loss (P&L) for a trader's portfolio of physical and financial oil contracts by marking them to the market.

tasks.description: Retrieve all open positions in the trader's portfolio at the end of the day.
tasks.expected_outcome: A complete list of all contracts in the portfolio is retrieved.

tasks.description: Get the official end-of-day settlement prices for all relevant commodities and futures contracts.
tasks.expected_outcome: The closing market prices are retrieved.

tasks.description: Revalue every position in the portfolio using the new market prices and calculate the total daily P&L.
tasks.expected_outcome: The daily P&L is calculated and reported to management.
